document_data.name: Othdil Mauneiyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Othdil "The Tamer" Mauneiyn''' was a mage of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was known for the mastery of monsters he had through his spells.
document_data.History: As of the early {{yearlink|1370}}s, he was looking to obtain the ''[[Crown of the Undying Flame]]''.
